Summary: BURNING MAN UFOs (one of many) - Star like diamond shaped
divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend and I were walking at Burning Man near 2'oclock and d, we were about walk back to our camp when we both noticed a very bright light we thought was a star at first but then got progressively larger in a few seconds time. He then pointed at it with a laser and it powered out straight into space in a matter of seconds. It was my b-day and 3am was when I was born so I was absolutely excited to have been blessed by that sighting.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Black Rock
This sighting has never been favorited.
